rukus.text: pachala rahi janara loko payagambarana gaya pachi, besi raheva para raji che, te'o'e allahana margamam potana dhana ane prana vade jehada karavane pasanda na karyum ane te'o'e kahi didhum ke avi garamimam na nikalo, kahi do ke jahannamani aga khuba ja garama che, kasa ke te'o samajata hota
basa! Te loko'e ghanum ja ochum hasavum jo'i'e ane ghanum ja vadhare radavum jo'i'e, te'o je kami pana kari rahya che tena badalamam

basa! Jo allaha ta'ala tamane temana ko'i jutha tarapha mokali pacha la'i ave, pachi a loko tamari sathe yud'dhana medanamam avavani paravanagi mange, to tame kahi do ke tame loko mari sathe avi nathi sakata ane na to mari sathe tame satru'o same yud'dha kari sako cho, tame prathama vakhata besi rahevanum pasanda karyum hatum, basa! Tame pachala rahi janara loko manja besi raho

te loko manthi ko'i mrtyu pame to tame temana janajhani namajha kayareya na padhaso ane na temani kabara para pana ubha raheso, a loko allaha ane tena payagambarano inkara karanara che ane mrtyu pamya sudhi vidrohi ja rahya

Tamane te'onum dhana ane santana, kami pana, ascaryacakita na kare, allahani iccha e ja che ke temane te vastu dvara duniyamam saja ape ane te loko potana prana nikalava sudhi inkara karanara ja bani rahya

jyare ko'i suraha avatarita karavamam ave che ke allaha para imana lavo ane tena payagambara sathe mali jehada karo, to temana manthi dhanavana lokonum eka jutha tamari pase avine evum kahi paravanagi la'i le che ke amane to besi rahenara lokomam ja chodi do
a to vesya'ono satha apavane ja prathamikata ape che ane temana hrdayo para mahora lagavi didhi, have te'o kami pana nathi samajata
parantu payagambara pote ane temani sathe imanavala'o, potana dhana ane prana vade jehada kare che, a ja loko bhala'i pamanara che ane a ja loko saphala thanara che
temana mate allaha'e te jannato taiyara kari rakhi che jeni nice nahero vahi rahi che, jemam te'o hammesa rahenara che, a ja moti saphalata che
